publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1420 Rhona Brankin: Gardening Scotland 2004 - 4 to 6 June-That the Parliament wishes the Gardening Scotland 2004 event at the Royal Highland Centre at Ingliston every success; congratulates the organisers on attracting 400 exhibitors to what is Scotland's biggest gardening exhibition; notes that over 30,000 visitors are expected to attend the event; acknowledges the many benefits of gardening, particularly in keeping older people active, and recognises the important contribution that horticulture makes to the Scottish economy.
S2M-1420 Gardening Scotland 2004 - 4 to 6 June (lodged on 4 June 2004) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-1420 Gardening Scotland 2004 - 4 to 6 June (lodged on 4 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1420 Gardening Scotland 2004 - 4 to 6 June (lodged on 4 June 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1420 Gardening Scotland 2004 - 4 to 6 June (lodged on 4 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
